description: Mô tả Công việc Job background At MSB, we believe in the value that data could bring to our businesses and our customers. We are transforming the bank to be a data-driven organization by building the foundation, processes, and capability to democratize data to decision makers. To achieve this potential, we are looking for talented Analytics Engineers to join our journey. MSB’s Analytics Engineers sit at the intersection of business teams, Data Analytics and IT and are responsible for bringing robust, efficient, and integrated data models to life. Analytics Engineers can speak the language of both business teams and technical teams, aiming to translate data insights and analysis needs into models powered by the MSB Data Platform. The successful Analytics Engineer is able to blend business acumen with technical expertise and transition between business strategy and data development. This position will report to Analytics Engineer Manager who reports to Head of Data Governance and Analytics Centre. Responsibilities As a team member responsible for helping to bridge the gap between business and technology, the Analytics Engineer role requires equal amounts business acumen and technical acumen. · Collaborate with stakeholders, team members to understand the analytics needs of the domain, define successful analytics outcomes, and fulfill those needs. · Partner with IT functions to define requirements about data infra functions and data sourcing. · Design, build, and deploy data models that support multiple analytics use cases across the bank. · Contribute to data catalog, a resource to support single source of truth analytics. · Implement the DataOps philosophy in everything you do. · Craft code that meets our internal standards for style, maintainability, and best practices for a high-scale database environment. Maintain and advocate for these standards through code review. · Perform bug fixes, apply enhancements to the models as when the need arises
